post:
**Special Spring Offer!** 
                            ** A Reliable Cloud Server Provider**
  
   [1QCloud.com](1qcloud.com) is a cloud server provider devoted to bringing you the high quality cloud hosting services at low costs. We are a team of **Cisco, Red Hat, Debian, FreeBSD** certified IT experts, with 10+ years of experience in implementing and managing IT infrastructures for small businesses and large enterprises.<br />
       Professional technical **support 24/7** with the fastest response time is guaranteed.<br />
       Our cloud hosting infrastructure is based on powerful SuperMicro enterprise hardware. The data is stored in the most secure **SSD grade RAID 10** storage systems that offer top-quality business agility and exceptional application uptime.
  
   Our equipment is located in the C7’s **Salt Lake City Datacenter**, which is a certified Tier III capacity enabling a seamless operation with **99.9% uptime**.
  
   We are not using VZ - all our cloud servers are **Xen-based,** with guaranteed resource allocation. All our clients will get **full root access.**
   
   [Learn more about our hosting infrastructure with the unlimited security and reliability.](http://www.1qcloud.com/infrastructure/)  
 
  We have 6 Plans to choose from. Special for LowendTalk.com our best selling one with **30% lifetime discount**!
 
  coupon code: **30OFF**
   
   **1 unit**
   
   * 1 core CPU 
   * 1 GB		RAM
   * 30 GB		disk
   * 10TB Bandwidth
   * 1 IPv4 IP Address/IPv6 Subnet
   * <del>$9.95/mo</del> -  **$6.96/mo NOW**
   
   [**ORDER NOW**](https://www.1qcloud.com/client/?ccce=cart&gid=1&pid=16&promocode=50OFF")
   
   [WANT MORE?](https://www.1qcloud.com/client/?ccce=cart&gid=1&pid=18)
  
  --------------------------------------------------------------------------
  
 **Start earning with 1Q Cloud New Affiliate Program!**
 
 Our new [affiliate program](https://www.1qcloud.com/affiliate-program) will allow you to earn money with little work or effort. We provide incredible 50% commission for each sale you refer and for all consequent payments of that customer! 
 In addition to that, we provide $10 bonus just for signing up! Too good to be true? That's right, and while you read this, someone else is signing up!
 
 **Who is this program for?**
 
 It is for people who own website/blog or who are active forum members and want to get some extra income. Get a unique tracking code for your websites that accounts for every visitor you refer and start earning! Our program is free to join, it's easy to sign up and requires no technical knowledge. 
 
 **How it Works**
 
 We'll provide you with code for a link to add to your site or email; this link will contain your unique ID, and each time someone clicks on your link and signs up for a qualified 1Q Cloud Server hosting plan, you'll earn 50% from the deal amount.
 
 **Why Us?**
 
 So what makes our affiliate program stand out? Easy: money and service! First off, you get 50% off all your customer's payment for life. Second, powerful templates! If you have a crazy sales idea for a pre-installed software solution, just reach out and we'll have it built for you in no time! From frameworks to gaming servers, we can build an automated deployment template for you as long as you can sell it!
 
 =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=<br />
 **Affiliate program details**<br />
 
 **Commission Type:**	50% perpetual payout: you receive half of all payments made by the clients you referred during their entire life span.<br />
 **Sign-up Bonus:**	$10 credited to your affiliate account upon activation.<br />
 **Payout Threshold:**	$25.00 USD - Minimum balance required for payout.<br />
 **Payout Duration:**	Payments are made on the 1st of each month, for valid orders older than 60 days.
 <br />
 <br />
 Don't miss this opportunity, [➡➡➡ REGISTER NOW](https://www.1qcloud.com/client/register) as a 1Q Cloud Affiliate!
 
 If you have any questions, please contact us through our website [https://www.1qcloud.com/.](https://www.1qcloud.com/)
 
 Thank you.
